SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,category,content,imagePath,viewCount, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate FROM board_month
WHERE UPPER(category) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{category})||'%'
WHERE UPPER(category) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{category})||'%' AND ( UPPER(title) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{title})||'%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{content})||'%')
WHERE UPPER(category) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{category})||'%' AND ( UPPER(title) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{title})||'%')
WHERE UPPER(category) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{category})||'%' AND ( UPPER(writer) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{writer})||'%')
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM board_month
WHERE UPPER(category) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{category})||'%' AND ( UPPER(title) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{title})||'%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{content})||'%')
WHERE UPPER(category) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{category})||'%' AND ( UPPER(title) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{title})||'%')
WHERE UPPER(category) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{category})||'%' AND ( UPPER(writer) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{writer})||'%')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT num,category,writer,title,content,viewCount,imagePath, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_month ORDER BY num DESC) WHERE num=#{num}
